name: Snickerdoodle Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup soft shortening 1 tsp baking soda
1 ½ cup sugar ½ tsp salt
steps: Mix together thoroughly the shortening, sugar, and eggs. Sift together flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt;
add to preceding mixture. Chill the dough. Roll into balls the size of small walnuts. Roll balls in mixture of sugar
and cinnamon. Place 2 inches apart on un-­‐greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees until lightly browned but soft,
